name: The Cartoon Kitchen: Lisa's Cold Chicken
description: This week's Cartoon Kitchen features Serious Eats' cartoonist in residence Larry Gonick's spin on cold chicken. —Ed Levine...

recipeInstructions.text: Place the chicken in a large stockpot; cover with water. Remove chicken, and boil water.
Return chicken to pot; bring to a boil again. Turn off heat; let chicken sit, cooling, for 45 minutes.

With your fingers, remove breast meat whole; slice across the grain. Arrange on platter; garnish with cold cilantro and green onion. Sprinkle with sesame seed or crushed peanuts. Serve with Chinese hoisin sauce on the side.
